entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
